title: Earthly Insight
description:
Earthly Insight is an eco-conscious AI Chat. Designed as an alternative to traditional AI chat, it offers fast, insightful responses while donating 33% of revenue to environmental causes. Whether you’re seeking answers, creative inspiration, or just great conversation, Earthly Insight delivers—helping you and the planet thrive with every chat.

We will be uploading more content in the gallery next week.
